PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-06322015-05-28,  DESD,  ,  , 
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that Canada Student Grants (CSGs) and Part-Time Canada Student Loans (PT-CSLs) continue to target students from Low-Income (LI) and Middle-Income (MI) families; and (2) ensure that the Low-Income and Middle-Income Thresholds align with inflation so that CSGs and PT-CSLs remain available to LI and MI students to assist with the cost of their post-secondary education.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0120 Publication Date: 2015-06-17
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that Canada Student Grants (CSGs) and Part-Time Canada Student Loans (PT-CSLs) continue to target students from Low-Income (LI) and Middle-Income (MI) families; and (2) ensure that the Low-Income and Middle-Income Thresholds align with inflation so that CSGs and PT-CSLs remain available to LI and MI students to assist with the cost of their post-secondary education.
